entry.title: Project categories?
entry.summary: Bitcoin-inquisition can be considered not as a traditional tool or library, but rather as a specialized instrument for conducting in-depth analyses of the potential value of proposed consensus changes within the Bitcoin ecosystem. This unique positioning allows it to serve a critical function by facilitating a thorough examination and understanding of how modifications to the consensus might impact the network's overall functionality and security. By leveraging bitcoin-inquisition, stakeholders can make more informed decisions regarding the adoption of changes, ensuring that any adjustments contribute positively to the stability and robustness of the Bitcoin infrastructure.
